statements: SELECT * FROM advertising_campaign_performance;
SELECT campaign_name, total_clicks FROM advertising_campaign_performance WHERE total_impressions > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM advertising_campaign_performance ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, total_impressions, total_clicks FROM advertising_campaign_performance WHERE total_clicks > total_impressions;
SELECT campaign_name, total_impressions, total_clicks FROM advertising_campaign_performance WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT campaign_name, total_impressions FROM advertising_campaign_performance WHERE total_clicks > 100 ORDER BY total_impressions DESC
SELECT * FROM advertising_campaign_performance WHERE start_date <= '2020-12-31' AND end_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, total_clicks FROM advertising_campaign_performance ORDER BY end_date ASC, total_clicks DESC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, total_impressions FROM advertising_campaign_performance WHERE total_impressions < 5000 ORDER BY total_impressions ASC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_clicks FROM advertising_campaign_performance WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND end_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY campaign_id DESC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM AdvertisingCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, budget, start_date, end_date FROM AdvertisingCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date, budget FROM AdvertisingCampaigns;
SELECT * FROM CampaignPerformance WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, clicks, conversions, revenue FROM CampaignPerformance;
SELECT * FROM AdvertisingCampaigns ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM AdvertisingCampaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, impressions, clicks, revenue FROM AdvertisingCampaigns JOIN CampaignPerformance ON AdvertisingCampaigns.campaign_id = CampaignPerformance.campaign_id;
SELECT AVG(budget) AS avg_budget, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM AdvertisingCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, conversions, revenue FROM CampaignPerformance JOIN AdvertisingCampaigns ON CampaignPerformance.campaign_id = AdvertisingCampaigns.campaign_id ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM advertising_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type FROM ads WHERE ad_size = 'Large';
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions FROM ad_performance GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, clicks, conversions FROM ad_performance WHERE campaign_id = 3 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT ad_name, ad_type FROM ads WHERE ad_size = 'Large' ORDER BY ad_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions FROM ad_performance GROUP BY campaign_id ORDER BY total_impressions DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM advertising_campaigns JOIN ad_performance ON advertising_campaigns.campaign_id = ad_performance.campaign_id WHERE clicks > 100 AND conversions > 5;
SELECT * FROM ads WHERE ad_type = 'Video' AND ad_size IN ('Small', 'Medium');
SELECT * FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, cost_per_click FROM ads WHERE cost_per_click BETWEEN 0.25 AND 0.50;
SELECT ad_id, date, engagements FROM ad_engagement WHERE engagements > 100 ORDER BY date;
SELECT ad_id, date, performance_score FROM ad_performance WHERE performance_score >= 4.5;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT ad_name, cost_per_click, clicks FROM ads WHERE impressions > 1000 ORDER BY cost_per_click ASC, clicks DESC;
SELECT ad_id, SUM(engagements) AS total_engagements FROM ad_engagement GROUP BY ad_id ORDER BY total_engagements DESC;
SELECT ad_name, performance_score FROM ads AS a INNER JOIN ad_performance AS ap ON a.id = ap.ad_id WHERE performance_score > 4.5;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, SUM(budget) AS total_budget FROM campaigns GROUP BY campaign_name, start_date, end_date ORDER BY total_budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 1000
SELECT ad_group_name, targeting_criteria, bid_amount FROM ad_groups WHERE bid_amount BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0
SELECT ad_title, ad_description FROM ads LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_name, advertising_channel FROM campaigns INNER JOIN ad_groups ON campaigns.campaign_id = ad_groups.campaign_id WHERE ad_group_name LIKE 'Brand%' ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT ad_title, ad_description FROM ads WHERE ad_type = 'Video' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT impression_datetime, location FROM impressions WHERE user_id = 1234 ORDER BY impression_datetime DESC;
SELECT ad_title, ad_description, ad_type FROM ads WHERE ad_type = 'Text' AND LENGTH(ad_description) > 100;
